dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: Hey, Vincent, I've heard that you and Yvonne have gotten pretty close lately? Are you two together or something?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Ah, well... We're just study partners. We've been preparing for the college entrance exams together.

dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: Just study partners? But I see you guys together all the time, even after school. Are you sure it's not something more?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: It's really just studying. I know thereâ€™s a lot of talk, but none of that is true.

dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: Oh, come on, Vincent, everyone's saying you two would make a great couple. You do seem really close.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: We're just good friends, honestly. Yvonne has helped me improve a lot in my studies. Our relationship isn't like what everyone thinks.

dialogues.name: ClassmateA
dialogues.content: Alright, if you say so. But if you two do end up together, you better tell me first!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I will. But for now, we're really just focused on studying.
